welcome_message_body: Welcome to Clovis, where the charm of small-town America meets the excitement of a vibrant city. Known for its rich history, great food, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that Clovis has to offer during your stay.

restaurants.name: Texas Roadhouse
restaurants.description: Texas Roadhouse is a steakhouse located in Clovis.
restaurants.address: 512 E Llano Estacado Blvd, Clovis, NM 88101

restaurants.name: Taco Villa
restaurants.description: Taco Villa is a taco restaurant located in Clovis.
restaurants.address: 3520 N Prince St (btw Llano Estacado & Colonial Parkway), Clovis, NM 88101

restaurants.name: Papa Murphy's
restaurants.description: Papa Murphy's is a pizzeria located in Clovis.
restaurants.address: 3900 N Prince St (at Texas St), Clovis, NM 88101

restaurants.name: Fat Boys BBQ
restaurants.description: Fat Boys BBQ is a bbq joint located in Curry County.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Fresno Air Terminal Airport, serving regional and commuter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fresno-Chandler Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Madera Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Madera Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
